Articles.Content:
Introducing Snowtiger's fourth spacecraft posted on the Spacecraft Exchange forum.

The Phantom Supersonic Fighter Jet can reach speeds up to 315m/s while cruising.

It is very easy to control and can do some nice maneuvers like a loop-de-loop and barrel rolls.

It is not an SSTO.

**Features:**

2 Standard Jet Engines

2 Ram Air Intakes

Chimichangas in the glove box

2 Headlights

2 Airbrakes

**Photos:**

[https://mega.co.nz/#!dgYWga4A!BNTU_PhiW4BEdhRxjB-6jBzo_PU3-dn99KHXh7NYJNg](https://mega.co.nz/#!dgYWga4A!BNTU_PhiW4BEdhRxjB-6jBzo_PU3-dn99KHXh7NYJNg)

**[Compatible with 1.0 KSP or higher]**

**\*ALSO\***

**I will make a master list of my crafts so the Spacecraft Exchange forum doesn't get packed up with my crafts!**
